author: IGN
description:
Check out the latest trailer for Korea. IL-2 Series, the newest entry in the acclaimed aerial combat-sim series! 
Using the backdrop of the Korean War, Korea. IL-2 Series will allow players to take to the skies in historically accurate aircraft used in the conflict. 
Korea. IL-2 Series is coming to Windows PC through Steam and IL-2 series store in Spring 2026.
title: Korea. IL-2 Series - Official Pre-Order Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Percy Jackson and the Olympians arrives in Fortnite for the first time with Percy Jackson: Siege of Monsters’ Island launching December 9.
Fight alongside your friends, complete quests to find your place among the demigods, and defend Camp Half-Blood in epic battles against mythical monsters. 
Launching on December 9, the Percy Jackson: Siege of Monsters Fortnite island will invite players and fans to embark on an authentic Percy Jackson adventure across an island map inspired by Camp Half-Blood – the earthly sanctuary and training facility for the children of mortals and Greek gods. As newly arrived demigods, players must discover the identity of their godly parent, gain new divine powers, and ally with their fellow demigods for a climactic battle against Scylla and Charybdis on the Sea of Monsters. 
Along the way, players will meet familiar characters including Percy Jackson, Annabeth Chase, and
Grover Underwood, and complete multiple side-quests and activities inspired by moments f
title: Percy Jackson and the Olympians x Fortnite - Official Siege of Monsters Island Trailer

author: IGN
description: What's left to do in Metroid Prime 4 after the credits? Check out our quick post game guide to get the low down on what awaits you after the final boss, from hard mode, to collectible hunting, and more. This is Metroid Prime 4 Beyond's post-game, explained.
title: Metroid Prime 4 Post-Game Guide - Endgame, NG+, and What to Do After the Credits

author: IGN
description:
Assassins Creed Shadows has finally made its way to the Nintendo Switch 2. And it’s a pretty impressive port at that. 

While it doesn’t support Ray Tracing or a 4K resolution, the game looks pretty great in both Docked and handheld modes. 
Docked mode outputs the game at a base 648p resolution while handheld offers a 400p resolution before upscaling and runs at a capped 30fps. That being said the game still holds up pretty well when compared to the PC port with every setting cranked all the way up.

Gameplay captured on a Docked Nintendo Switch 2

#IGN #gaming
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows - Switch 2 vs PC Graphics Comparison

author: IGN
description:
NVC 791: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=71yb-oWNFlM

You’re not dreaming: Metroid Prime 4 is here, and it is great. After eight years of waiting, we can’t wait to tell you all about what we think of Samus Aran’s latest adventure. Join Logan Plant, Brendan Graeber, Rebekah Valentine, and Seth Macy as they dive into Logan and Brendan’s in-depth thoughts on Prime 4.

#MetroidPrime4 #Switch2 #Gaming
title: Metroid Prime 4 Review Discussion - NVC Clips

author: IGN
description: Watch the Genshin Impact x Duolingo trailer for this upcoming collaboration between the action RPG and the educational app. With the Genshin Impact x Duolingo collaboration, a limited-time 3-Day Streak Quest will be available in the Duolingo app. Starting Monday, December 8, learners in select regions across the world can participate in this event, complete the 3-day streak quest accompanied by popular Genshin Impact characters, and earn exclusive in-game rewards including a Namecard and an Avatar. The partnership runs from December 8 through December 27, 2025.
title: Genshin Impact x Duolingo - Official Collaboration Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Fallout cast members Walton Goggins (Cooper Howard/The Ghoul). Aaron Moten (Maximus), Kyle MacLachlan (Hank MacLean), Moises Arias (Norm MacLean), and Frances Turner (Barb Howard) sat down with IGN for an extended interview about what's in store for their characters in Season 2.

Fallout: Season 2 launches on Prime Video on December 17, 2025.

#Fallout #PrimeVideo #IGN
title: Fallout Season 2 Cast Interview: “The Ghoul's Battling Actually Becoming Human"

author: IGN
title: Robosen is making a fully auto-converting Transformers Soundwave robot and it costs more than $1,000

author: IGN
description:
Lucy (Ella Purnell) and The Ghoul (Walton Goggins) make a pit stop in Novac on their way to New Vegas in the first clip from Fallout Season Two.
The new season will pick up in the aftermath of Season One’s epic finale and take audiences along for a journey through the wasteland of the Mojave to the post-apocalyptic city of New Vegas. The highly anticipated eight-episode season will premiere on December 17th.
title: Fallout Season 2 - Official Clip | CCXP 2025

author: IGN
description:
One of the biggest news stories of the year just broke. Netflix has entered into a definitive agreement to buy Warner Bros., including its film and television studios, HBO, and HBO Max, in a deal worth $82.7 billion.
So, a 100 year old movie studio is being bought by a 28 year old streaming service that started out as a DVD by mail service.
This all means that Netflix would now be the home of HBO and all its properties including Game of Thrones. The DC Universe. Harry Potter. And video game franchises like Mortal Kombat, the Batman Arkham franchise, and the Travellers Tales Lego games like Lego Star Wars and the upcoming Lego Batman: Legacy of the Dark Knight.
Mergers like this usually mean raising prices -- just look at what happened with Xbox’s acquisition of Activision Blizzard and the price of Game Pass.
Daemon, Seth, and Michael are here to break it all down for you.
title: After this $80B Merger, Netflix just Became a Major Game Dev - What's Next?
